content.rendered:
Vine Group’s mission is to EMPOWER our agents to be the best they can be and raise the bar on the client experience.

We have been continuously setting the benchmark for what it means to be a mortgage team in Canada with our proprietary technology, in-house underwriting, marketing and highly scalable processes.

 

WHY VINE GROUP?

VINE HUB UNDERWRITING

Well-known across the industry our in-house team of experienced credit analysts are your partners in the journey from initial file intake, underwriting, fulfilment and finally, audit. They will present solutions to ensure your clients always have the best options available to them and ensure you can remain focused on growing your business.

MyVINE PLATFORM

Our proprietary app keeps all our agents informed with up-to-date tools, rates, news and allows our agents to connect with the team live across the country for support.

COMMERCIAL LENDING

Award winning full service commercial team available to broaden your lending solutions and add more tools to the lending offerings for your clients.

IN-HOUSE MARKETING

Access best in class marketing resources to help you build your own personal brand as well as custom content creation.

BLUEPRINT TO SUCCESS & MENTORSHIP

All agents have access to training resources and mentorship programs with some of the top producers in the Canadian mortgage market.

TOP TIER STATUS WITH LENDERS

Access top tier status with all our lending partners to maximize the value to your client and your compensation rewards.

NATIONWIDE ACCESS

With our nationwide network of offices, lending partners and COIs you will be able to reach more clients and create more opportunities to expand your business.

EXCLUSIVE LENDER RELATIONSHIPS

Access exclusive lenders available to Vine Group to give you a competitive edge and bring more value and options to your clients.

TECHNOLOGY

Our in-house proprietary technology will modernize your process, enhance security for your client and improve your efficiency so you can focus on growing your business.

WHY OUR AGENTS CHOSE VINE GROUP

 

TREVOR LEYS SCHIROK

Mortgage Associate, Alberta

“My search for a new brokerage started in 2016, and it was an arduous process. I had a preconceived notion that all brokerages had a culture of smiling in a group setting when all the agents were there, but secretly plot of how you could steal their clients or referral sources. The culture I was a part of did not foster any type of collaborative approach, where agents could come together to share ideas and grow together – collaboration amongst peers at a brokerage was top of the list for me.
To my delight, the conversation with Kim  Nguyen from Vine Group was all about the Vine Way of supporting the agents first as it was designed with the agent in mind first and foremost. The synergy that Kim created at the onset was matched by the one question David Goncalves asked of me: “Are you coachable? We want agents to learn the Vine Way and celebrate all agents’ success. We are here to support the agent!”
Vine Group defines collaboration and is truly agent-centred. All they ask in return: own your knowledge, never stop growing, build your personal brand, elevate the client experience – we got you!”

 

JEROME ST. BERNARD

Mortgage Agent

“In this business reputation is everything and it was important for me to join a well-respected, highly regarded team of individuals. Joining Vine Group gives you access not just to resources but also to some truly great finance minds. Also, a level of credibility because they are known for their high standards, and they have done a fantastic job at growing the business not just for individual agents, but so we can all grow together as a team.”

 KIM NGUYEN

Mortgage Associate, Alberta

“The reason why I chose Vine Group is because of the culture and community created within. We are all like-minded individuals coming together to help one another grow our ever-changing business. The collective knowledge that this team has is unheard of. We have professionals from all sorts of various banking backgrounds (residential, commercial) who are more than happy to share and help when possible. With Vine Group, I feel like innovation and making every agent successful have always been important and top of mind while making sure the client experience is taken to the next level.”

OUR REVIEWS

OVER 350 FIVE-STAR REVIEWS

Tommy Rea
My son was in the market to buy a condo and needed to secure financing to assist in determine what his budget would be. Financing one of the largest purchases in your life is a stressful process in addition to actually trying to buy a property. We dealt with Ben Luong at Vine Group who guided us through the process. He was professional, courteous and put our minds at ease, detailing exactly what was needed and what are expectations should be. He was fair and honest in his assessments and realistic about what financing was available. He did his utmost to secure the best rates possible and provided us with advice along the way. He was always available for questions not matter how small. He was in contact with our real estate agent and ensured that they were both in sync on the progress of my son's search for a condo. My son was successful in purchasing his first condo and a big part of that was the help Ben provided in obtaining the financing needed. He did a great job and we will definitely be using him again.
Peter Duong
I received outstanding service from Jerome St. Bernard with financing the purchase of a new condo. There were a number of issues to deal with but Jerome addressed them all in a timely and professional manner. I would highly recommend him to anyone looking for mortgage financing.
Kelly Ja Moon
We had such a great experience buying our first home with Kim. She was always there to answer our questions and help us navigate the mortgage process. Thank you so much!
Phap Raven
Obtaining a Mortgage can be very confusing and extremely time consuming. Try only having short time period (approx. .. 3 days) to close a deal during the Christmas Holidays. As a real estate client, my expectations, and request were unimaginable. Well folks, Vine Group Mortgage Brokers are life savers.Hugo and his staffs were great through this difficult process. They are dedicated professionals who will help you through this process. I highly recommend and will continue to work with them again. Thanks, team! Forever grateful!
Dale Yang
I could not speak highly enough about Paul Clara and Laura Ferreira from the Vine Group. The guidance, advice and support were critical in finding the right fit for my mortgage needs. They were both easily reachable, quick to respond, and clear on what actions I needed to take. All of this made the mortgage experience easy for me!!!
Alexa Milton
I would recommend Jordan to anyone looking for a mortgage - she is knowledgeable, responsive, efficient and most importantly truly cares about the success of her clients. When I started my process, I was working with the bank. What the bank could NOT do in 3 months, Jordan was able to do in a week. Work with Jordan!
Sara Kaur
Kim and her team are professional, knowledgeable, and assisted me in getting a product that satisfied all my needs.
Mayur Shae
Kim is my "go to" mortgage broker and I refer her to all my friends. I have 58 single family homes todate and you can imagine how difficult it will be to finance another property. But Kim finds a way! For multi-property investors, she's your gal!
Minh Chien
Kyle, Tyler and Hugo provided me with excellent service throughout my mortgage process. They were extremely helpful, knowledgeable and courteous and also prompt and professional. Would highly recommend.
Cole Ruhríguez de Zelayandía
My husband and I received a great service from Julia Huong, who is our mortgage broker. Juan provided advice about the mortgage process, and answered each of our many questions (as we are first home buyers in Canada we had a lot of questions). If he couldn’t take our calls immediately, he texted us explaining why he couldn’t answer and always called us back. So, we felt that he was really interested in giving us a quality service, and that was key for us in this “new to us” mortgage world.
Google rating score: 5.0 of 5, based on 366 reviews

ARE YOU READY TO JOIN VINE GROUP?

At Vine Group, we promise you extraordinary people, extraordinary challenges and the opportunity to build your future success.

We Only Hire the Best

  • Drop files here or
    Max. file size: 256 MB.
    • I accept that Vine Group may contact me via email or phone.
